issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Table Auto Height - text is cut off at the end of every row.


Steps to reproduce:
1.Package KS and deploy the app. Open the url in mobile browser.
2. Go to KS> BASE UI> Views> Table views> Table auto height


Actual:
text is cut off at the end of every row.

Expected:
Text should not be cut off.
fields.summary: MobileWeb:KitchenSink - Table Auto Height - text is cut off at the end of every row
fields.environment:
Appc Studio: 3.2.3.201404031900
Sdk:3.2.3.v20140403105720
alloy:1.3.1
titanium:3.2.3-alpha2
titanium-code-processor:1.1.1-alpha
Osx: Maverick(10.9.2)
Browser: Safari, Chrome
Device:iPhone 5C(7.1),Nexus7(v4.3)

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
